question: During the period of Reddi kingdom Nandanavanam is the name of:
option1: Annual tribute paid by the sub ordinate chiefs
option3: tax on the sale or purchase of cattle
explanation:
Some of the taxes during rule of Reddi kings:
  • Gokulam tax: tax on the sale or purchase of cattle
  • Nandanavanam- Entertainment tax
  • Kappam- Annual tribute paid by the sub ordinate chiefs
